title: Huge Lag and Delay ever since new client replace old one.
body:
Hi everyone its been a while seen old client been replaced but i honestly cant play as i keep getting some weird delay that prevent my champ from moving/casting though i can still see opponent moving...


Honestly need help cuz my pc play PUBG/OW with high/ultra without any lagging!!!!!

replies.body: Getting frame skips and delay is crappy, and we need to pinpoint where this is stemming from.  Input delays can usually result from packet loss, so run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to give us an overview if this is the case.  Let me know what you find!
